document_title: Frontal sinus mucocele: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
According to Dr. Thuy Hang, the cause of frontal sinus mucocele has not yet been determined, but studies show that mucocele can form due to prolapse factors.
Due to blockage of the sinus passages; Structural abnormalities or chronic sinusitis; Radiation therapy in the head and face causes scarring; Tumors in the sinuses for a long time.; Trauma caused by trauma.; Complications after sinus surgery.; Fibrous dysplasia.; Osteoma or fibroma.
